content:
As an AI language model, I cannot assess The Indian Express's success at engaging its audience on digital platforms. However, The Indian Express has a significant digital presence with a wide reach in India and beyond. The newspaper's website and mobile app have been awarded various recognitions for excellence in journalism and digital innovation. Moreover, The Indian Express has a strong social media presence with millions of followers across prominent social media platforms. The newspaper also uses analytics to understand its audience and create targeted content to engage them.

The Indian Express also invites users to participate in discussions and share their opinions on various topics, creating an active community of readers. The use of multimedia content, such as videos and podcasts, also enhances the user experience and helps keep users engaged. Additionally, The Indian Express has been able to reach younger audiences by tailoring its content strategy and providing content that aligns with their interests and preferences.

Overall, The Indian Express has a strong digital presence and appears to be successful in engaging its audience on multiple digital platforms with its diverse and insightful content.
